DOC.brief_summary: This cohort study sequential expansion comparative effectiveness study oral anticoagulant plan identify initiator oral anticoagulant use electronic claim data commercial insurance database quantify association anticoagulant choice ( warfarin dabigatran ) occurrence select outcomes patient non-valvular atrial fibrillation risk stroke .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : A recorded diagnosis atrial fibrillation . Initiation anticoagulant medication ( dabigatran ( new oral anticoagulant become available ) warfarin ) . At least 18 year age date anticoagulant initiation . CHA2DS2VASc score least 1 Exclusion criterion : Patients miss ambiguous age sex information . Patients evidence valvular disease . Patients less 12 month enrolment precede date anticoagulant initiation Patients dispense oral anticoagulant 12 month precede date anticoagulant initiation Patients nursing home stay 12 month precede date anticoagulant initiation
